text:
I managed to do this with the {% choice %} tag but you can't use those in a module

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Pulling-a-hubdb-column-in-as-a-choice-dropdown/td-p/2267>

This explains it, I think in my post I just show how you can get the key value pairs to work
<@U22VBL87M> you sly devil, you. :eyes:  <@UDJV5B73R> I'll take a read-through
Idea: would be nice to have a prev/next button for moving through items in a repeater
